metadata.name: Sweetheart
metadata.description:
I am captivated by your beauty,
And it seems to be a long time.
I'm in love with you,
♪ I don't have to say a word ♪
I'm in love with you and I don't know what to do,
 like the wind in my arms 
There's no beauty like you
♪ Even if you believe it so much ♪

Oil on canvas, canvas size 40/30 cm
In the presence of only one physical art ! I send mail at a convenient time for you !
